app.name: Multi-Mod Manager [MMM]
app.long_description: - Nice 1 glance view of all IOS to manage/dop - Fast 1 button install of all WADs in a folder - Launch your homebrew apps from SD - Launch Priiloader or manage its hacks - Express 1-click Install and Patch IOS36 - View Wii System Information - Flexible IOS reload via easy selection screen - Fast D-PAD navigation and shortcut buttons - Easy to use menu interface - No forced loading of IOS
